thread.title: Connecticut taxpayer service center offline for maintenance
thread.title_full: Connecticut taxpayer service center offline for maintenance

title: Connecticut taxpayer service center offline for maintenance
text:
Connecticut's taxpayer service center to be offline over weekend for upgrades, maintenance 
THE ASSOCIATED PRESS Published: 7/11/15 10:24 am EDT - Updated: 7/11/15 10:26 am EDT 
HARTFORD, Connecticut â€” The taxpayer service center operated by the Connecticut Department of Revenue Services will be offline for computer maintenance over the weekend. 
The state's free, online tax filing and payment system was scheduled to be back up and running on Monday, July 13. DRS is performing computer maintenance and system upgrades. 
Taxpayers who attempt to access the center during the weekend will receive a message saying the center is "currently unavailable due to scheduled maintenance and upgrades." DRS chose to make the upgrades this weekend because the dates did not coincide with any filing or payment due dates.
